name: Safe Delivery
description:
Safe Delivery

This prototype was made for the Trijam #107 with "Package Devliery" as theme. 

Launch package to their destination by controlling your power. The wind will affect the package's trajectory.

It was put together quite quickly before submission deadline (I forgot I had joined the jam); therefore it's incomplete and has no sound or fancy menus / UI, just the absolute bare minimum.

Time lapse of development will be posted on youtube soon.

Total development time: 1 hour & 50 minutes.

Controls

  • Space to set direction and to launch
  • Left Ctrl (hold) to see target destination

Technology

  • Game Engine: Unity
  • Art: Top-Down 2D RPG Assets Pack by Goldmetal from Unity Asset Store (Free asset).
